description.0: A collection of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few pieces concerning the skies, dandelions, and other topics beloved by Mondstadters.

0.0: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>8%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>6%</cryo>. Max 3 stacks. Can occur once every 0.3s.

1.0: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>10%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>7.5%</cryo>. Max 3 stacks. Can occur once every 0.3s.

2.0: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>9%</cryo>. Max 3 stacks. Can occur once every 0.3s.

3.0: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>14%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>10.5%</cryo>. Max 3 stacks. Can occur once every 0.3s.

4.0: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>16%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Max 3 stacks. Can occur once every 0.3s.
